name: Inspire Ventures
description:
Inspire is one of Southeast Asia's most active venture builders located in Thailand, Indonesia, Vietnam, and the Philippines.

Our Venture Labs group builds businesses that solve real problems and fill unique value-chain gaps faced by Southeast Asian businesses and consumers. We develop in-house with our committed technology development team and focus heavily on recruiting great managers who are astute operators. 

Our Venture Capital group invests in early stage and high growth businesses that are scaling proven, and sometimes novel, business models in the Southeast Asian markets with a strong emphasis on localization.

LOCATIONS
- Bangkok, Thailand
- Jakarta, Indonesia
- Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
- Manila, Philippines
